sections.title: Ashavic Dancer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Ashavic Dancer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Ashavic Performance (Su) (Ashavic Dancer)
sections.description: Allows the use of Perform (dance) to create magical effects similar to bardic performance, starting as a move action and maintaining as a free action. Performance has visual components only and can be disrupted by certain conditions.

sections.title: Deathwaking Dance (Su) (Ashavic Dancer)
sections.description: Deals positive energy damage to all undead and haunts within 30 feet each round the performance is maintained. Damage equals 1d6 + Charisma modifier, Will save negates.

sections.title: Untethering Steps (Su) (Ashavic Dancer)
sections.description: Uses Perform (dance) checks against CMD to inflict sickened condition on undead targets, with staggered condition if the check exceeds CMD by 10 or more. Can target multiple undead based on class level.

sections.title: Soothing Performance (Su) (Ashavic Dancer)
sections.description: Gains the soothing performance bardic performance ability at 6th level.

sections.title: Exorcist’s Waltz (Su) (Ashavic Dancer)
sections.description: Requires 4 consecutive rounds of performance to end compulsion or possession effects, functioning like break enchantment or granting new saves against possession. Prevents re-possession for 24 hours.

sections.title: True Spark’s Guidance (Su) (Ashavic Dancer)
sections.description: Targets one undead per round within 60 feet, dealing massive damage and applying staggered condition on failed Will saves, or halving speed on successful saves. Penalties apply near consecrated areas or origin points.

sections.title: Ashavic Rites (Su) (Ashavic Dancer)
sections.description: Allows mind-affecting Ashavic performances and spells to overcome undead immunity to mind-affecting effects, including mindless undead. Requires spending additional performance rounds for spells.

sections.title: Peerless Dancer (Ex) (Ashavic Dancer)
sections.description: Gains versatile performance with Perform (dance) and can add additional skills to versatile performance at higher levels. Grants Skill Focus as bonus feat if already possessing dance versatile performance.

sections.title: Ghostly Grace (Su) (Ashavic Dancer)
sections.description: During Ashavic performance, weapons gain ghost touch and spells affect incorporeal creatures fully. At 9th level, allies within 30 feet also gain these benefits.
